attributes.action: make Swindon be recognised as a city
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Swindon is one of the fastest growing towns in England at present and has a population of approximately 200,000.  With an unemployment level well below the national average, Swindon plays host to many of the UK's and some of the worlds largest companies.  Swindon is full of potential with exciting regeneration initiatives across it's city centre leading towards an exciting future.  Please help support Swindon to the status it deserves
